description: Kale & Vance ... These two were a perfect match and you could tell from the start that they'd been thinking about this for a long time. I'm not sure who wanted it more, but in the end, I think it was Vance who was itching to be fucked and Kale delivers his wish, but Vance also returns the favor so it was a win/win for both them and ourselves as the heat smolders between these two hotties. Who Talked Who Into What? ... In his War Chest solo I teased Vance about playing with a dildo the next time he visited us and about leaving the door open for Kale. Well, we skipped the dildo, but seems the door was opened for Kale -- and Vance decided to give this a go. I'm not sure who talked who into it, but who cares? They decided to try it and we couldn't be happier. The truth comes out a little as we listen to the two of them talk in the beginning of the scene, but you'll have to listen to that conversation. They plead the fifth on a few issues and I don't press on. I'm ready like the rest of us to see these two go at it. So, in usual form, I leave the room to go bake a pie while the pants come off and Kale starts eyeing Vance's big dick. Lose the Shirts, Stickin' the Dicks ... By the time I return they've both lost the shirts and are playing with their hard cocks. Doesn't take long for the pants to follow and then a comparison of cocks ensues. What follows is simply magic between these two. I won't spoil it for you.
title: Kale & Vance, Scene #01
